org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces
Interface Interface

All Known Subinterfaces:
Float64, Float64Array, Int32, Int32Array, Option, Serial, UInt32Digital
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFloat64, AbstractFloat64Array, AbstractInt32, AbstractInt32Array, AbstractInterface, AbstractSerial, AbstractUInt32Digital
public interface Interface

Base for an interface to a port or device.
